actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize construction of pumped-storage power facilities as a project feature, if economically feasible, at Richard B. Russell Dam and Lake.

summary.text: Modifies the Richard B. Russell Dam and Lake Project (formerly Trotters Shoals) in Georgia and South Carolina to authorize a study of the feasibility of pumped-storage power as a project purpose. Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to conduct such study.

titles.title: A bill to authorize construction of pumped-storage power facilities as a project feature, if economically feasible, at Richard B. Russell Dam and Lake.
